website_summaries.verdict: 12-cup machine that caters to users’ desires: delay your brew, monitor coffee freshness, select strength, and switch between pots.
pros: Brew your coffee in the moment, or set the timer for later brewing
Keeps track of when coffee was brewed for freshness
Comes with glass pot, but also compatible with thermal carafe (separate purchase)
cons: Lifting top to access filter means the machine requires more room to use

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, two broke in less than year.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker became clogged and stopped pumping water in less than a year, creating only steam instead of pumping water into the coffee. It fogged the display which shortly failed. This is despite cleaning with vinegar as recommended. Mr. Coffee has a 1 year warranty, they sent me a new one, the new one now leaks water all over the counter. Waste of time and money, I wont buy from their product line anymore. They do have good customer service, but you're still buying garbage, just with good service.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Garbage coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Christmas thinking it would be good quality, being a Mr. Coffee brand. While it does make coffee, the sensor underneath the caraffe warmer doesnt work and always defaults to Thermal instead of Glass, so it wont keep your coffee warm. YOu can hit on/off about 30 times and it will switch to glass sometimes, but nobody wants to do that. I'm sending it back and going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Look Ma No Drips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the same model that had stopped working. It lasted long enough that I thought it was worth re-ordering. On my first pour I noticed a fix to what I had considered a maddening flaw. I could not pour the last one slow enough to make it not spill. The design of the lip was just somehow wrong. I had taken to just pouring my cup standing over the sink. On my first pour with this new pot and everyone since, I am delighted that this issue has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pires

customer_reviews.title: extremely disappointed with product
customer_reviews.text: extremely disappointed with product. it's only 2 months old and not brewing correctly; condensation appears in clock window which makes it impossible to program or set clock. We clean with vinegar solution every 2 weeks and take care with product. the same model purchased previously lasted 3 years? at least we could return to store.
customer_reviews.author: gregory a cleary

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous defect with the decanter
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Coffee makes high quality brewers. That is the only reason this is getting 1 star. During our very first use while we ran just water through to clean it, the plastic handle and metal band popped off of the decanter and nearly burned one of my employees. Amazon has already agreed to replace the item, but that's less of a concern to me than the safety of the decanter. The way the decanter is constructed is by pressure alone. There are no pieces that screw it together, so if something is off, even a little bit, the whole thing can pop off of the decanter and fall out of your hands. Test carefully with cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Crystina W

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Quality of Prior Mr. Coffee Makers!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I made coffee with this pot, it leaked water out of the water reservoir as the coffee was brewing - 1/2 the water went in the pot and the rest on the kitchen counter. I couild not return the product because I had already recycled the box it came in (never occurred to me that there would be a need to return it). The glass carafe itself is also very thin, and looks like it would not hold up well. Even for this low price point, this version of the Mr. Coffee pot is a waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: NumberOneLadiesBookseller

customer_reviews.title: Brew Careful
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever! At one time, Mr. Coffee used to make dependable coffee makers that lasted for a decade. Now these cheap things break 1 1/2 years later. Mine just suddenly stopped brewing. Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I got a lemon, but this thing only worked about a week and then just shut off. Won't start, won't perk, won't do anything. I went to the Dollar Store and bought one for $19.00 and it works fine. Not as fancy, but it works. I didn't bother to send this back as I did not have the box...I threw it away. I have used Mr Coffee products before with no problem, but this one was not one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Locke

customer_reviews.title: Short life - buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee maker in November 2017 and I am now shopping for a new one. About a week ago, it really slowed down, taking up to an hour to brew. I ran vinegar multiple times, however the coffee maker never recovered. If I put water in for eight cups, I get four at best. I know this isn’t a high end maker, but it should have lasted longer than 5 months - goodbye Mr. Coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Definitely satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bad boy for about a month now, and I am very satisfied with my purchase. My last coffee maker was second hand gifted to me, and had lasted YEARS in my possession. It was time for a replacement, and I am completely content with my new coffee maker. The user interface is fairly easy to navigate, and the programmable delay brew option is PREFECT for my early mornings. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the office over a year a ago. It's been making 1-2 pots every day M-F. I picked it out because it took the large "bucket" style filters (which are cheap!), and because the opening in the top of the glass carafe was big enough to fit my hand in to clean it. Auto shutoff works great too. We buy 5lb bags of Starbucks and grind the beans fresh one pot at a time, so we're moderately discriminating in our tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: JUNK - dont buy
customer_reviews.text: JUNK. This unit has a magnetic switch in the bottom of the unit. Its supposed to detect if you have a carafe or a glass pot onn the burner, and turn the burner off if a carafe is detected. We dont use a carafe at all - and when we set our delay brew for 6:30 am - the unit brewed, andf then the coffee went cold. I fopund an easy fix on you tube - remove the magent. But the geniuses at Mr. Coffee installed 6 tamper proof screws in the bottom, and I cant remove the switch. JUNK from the word go.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Loh

customer_reviews.title: overall good quality and what was expected!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great product. I love the timed setting that allows me to set up the coffee and night and tell it to brew at xyz time and it’s already there hot and ready to go. Cons: the water gets almost too hot and sometimes gives my coffee a “burnt” flavor. I’ve used the same amount of coffee and same type as I did in my last machine. I also wish it had a way to turn the noise functions off, the beeping terrorizes my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Curtis

customer_reviews.title: We love this coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this coffee maker! We had a keurig that gave out on us, so we got this. We like having the option of coffee strength! And we like being able to program it so that the coffee is ready when we get up. We won’t go back to the keurig. Oh, it doesn’t come with a reusable basket for coffee grinds, so you’ll need to get one. If this review is helpful please hit the helpful button.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dewitz

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker years ago in red, and decided to get another one when too many grounds were getting in the pot. This is an excellent coffee maker for the money. Timer always works. We keep it set to strong, and always make a full pot. Be careful with how much water you put in! Even though there are slots in the back so the water doesn't get too high (it runs out the back) it's still possible to put too much water in so it overflows the pot. I don't like that I have to purchase filters on top of the coffee filters, but it's a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Averill

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 2 months and now it will not turn off unless it is unplugged. That fact eliminates one of its "key features" so it will have to be replaced as it isn't feasible for our family to babysit a coffe pot. And, of course, the return window has closed. Also, the clock display is covered in condensation so it's useless, as well. I will say that while it was working properly, the coffee brewed quickly and tasted fine.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardin

customer_reviews.title: This just flooded into filter area and made no coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: This just flooded into filter area and made no coffee other then the overflow on my counter, for 2nd time since I got it for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Solid coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a Mr. Coffee 12-cup coffee maker since I got married (16 years ago). This is my third, so I suppose they have an average life of 8 years by my experience. Obviously I like them, since I keep buying the same one. :) It's easy to program, makes good coffee, and doesn't drain my bank account. In about eight years I imagine I will be back to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Blevins

customer_reviews.title: i wouldn't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This Product is leaking. I thought it was me spilling until last night is set it up for delay and 2 hours later there was water all over my counter. What a mess!! Now they are saying I am not eligible for return. i wouldn't recommend this to anyone. Buy Coffee makers in the store not from Amazon. Any other store I would have been able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: No good. Just stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Man, I hate writing reviews like this, but this thing turned itself into a useless paperweight, without any warning, less than 8 weeks into it's life. Junk. Do NOT buy it. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after three months!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend’s family (12/25/19). Arrived today (3/29/20) to find them using a cheap alternative. The coffee pot broke after only THREE months? It heats up but no longer percolates. I am disappointed and embarrassed. I purchased Mr. Coffee because I believed it to be a reliable brand. His family was so incredibly pleased when they unwrapped my gift to find I replaced their last coffee pot of 3 years (a Mr Coffee as well) with a Mr Coffee coffee pot that included all the bells and whistles. I do not recommend. Don’t make the same mistake I did. A mistake that effected, not just me, but those I was trying to bless.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great even for coffee snobs
customer_reviews.text: We are coffee snobs, to be sure, and usually use a cone-filter coffee maker. But when the coffee maker busted after just one year and I realized that was the trend for the last three fancy-brand coffee makers, we decided to give Mr. Coffee a try. It is excellent! Makes great coffee, the timer works well, and my favorite feature is that this design keeps the coffee warmer for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: S Greene

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty
customer_reviews.text: After 15 months of great coffee the item just stopped one day. I couldn't tell why despite going over all the trouble shooting recommendations in the instruction book. Having seen all the reviews before I bought it I had purchased an extended warranty for an extra year for $3. Called the outfit and they were very responsive and sent me a postage paid return slip and a promise to send me a full refund when they receive the coffee maker back. I'll buy another one and take an extended warranty since the coffee was great while it worked. $32 is not a high price to pay for two years of good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee maker with water filtration filters I use mine with MR. Coffee reusable gold filter. I brew a pot and later clean out filter and don’t have a issue. Comes in plain brown mr coffee box not in retail box as shown. The other reviews with overflows look like they have either to much coffee in filter or they are reusing one time use paper filters that are clogged with to much or old coffee grounds.
customer_reviews.author: mike lynch

customer_reviews.title: Save big and get more features
customer_reviews.text: After using a keurig for about ten years, I had enough of paying 60 cents a cup. I drink 4-6 cups at home. I decided I would return to a mr coffee to reduce my crazy coffee budget. This Mr Coffee maker exceeded my needs, it’s easy to use and has great features. It’s paid for itself in the first two weeks. Jon
customer_reviews.author: Carczar

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up and a nice cup-o-Joe. I personally can't see spending $100 plus on a coffee maker that clogs and spills all the coffee over the sink ... sometimes it just doesn't pay for all the bells and whistles! I'm a coffee drinker, not a snob ... all I ask for is my pot of coffee in the AM, without all the fuss and ritual. This is a perfectly fine coffee maker for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Kristiansen

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to make coffee right away
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with enough parts to make coffee. Was hoping to have a hot cup of coffee after it finally arrived, there is no filter basket you have to go out and buy some paper filters or spend more money to get a coffee basket what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: michael g California Kid

customer_reviews.title: Must like it because I have owned or bought 4
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these for various locations in my life. All in all it makes a good cup of coffee, if you keep using coffee maker cleaner on a regular basis. Takes a little bit of work to get it programmed properly. And when you use the strong flavor setting, you must allow extra time for the carafe to heat the coffee once it’s made, because of cooler temp from a slower drip in that mode.
customer_reviews.author: M. Konowitz

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Overflows
customer_reviews.text: We have had 2 more expensive coffee makers and both died after a few years. We decided to go cheaper since we keep replacing anyway. This maker has overflowed quite a few times since we had it. I removed the chlorine filter- that helped for a few brews, then we tried a coarse ground coffee and that got mixed results. I am trying to give this machine a shot and so far if you don’t fill too much grounds it’s ok- it seems the last 4 days it’s not overflowed, but I can’t use as much grounds as usual and I always have a towel nearby. It’s suoer frustrating. Honestly would not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: John Fontes

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my dad's coffee maker and looked for something fairly straight forward as he's not a bells and whistles kind of guy. This coffee maker offers many more options than needed but is easy to use and makes a great pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There is a water filter disc you have to attach to the top of the basket every time you brew. Hate it. I assume you also need to purchase replacements for filter. Leaving it off prevents water dispersal to basket. The area to pour water into the back of machine is very small, easy to miss and have the water dump right out the front. There's a swivel arm you have to move over the basket and if you forget to do that, guess who's not going to be drinking coffee in 30 minutes when you go back for a cup. Very loud alarm beeps when brewing is complete and later for who knows what reason. Wouldn't recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Our coffee pot at work died suddenly. I scrambled and bought this immediately and it was delivered next day. We all survived and we're very happy with this coffee maker. Brews quickly and turns itself off when we all forget it's still on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, it worked great for 11 months. We used this in our camper, so it was only being used on a few times a year. Then one day, the electronic start button stopped working. Can't make coffee. AVOID PURCHASING THIS DEVICE, IT IS COMPLETELY UNRELIABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hermiller

customer_reviews.title: A really good coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is amazing. Comes with a filter and everything. I will say though sometimes if you dont put everything in correctly then it will spill off to the side and all ove the counter, but that might be user error ;) I love being able to set the time and wake up to fresh coffee in the morning and the filters actually do m ake it tastier!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pirkle

customer_reviews.title: IT MAKES GREAT COFFEE dd OF COURSE WITH cARMEL CREAMER BUT FRESH ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING, I AM DISSAPOINTED, VERY! 2 WEEKS AGO WHEN I GOT IT, IT MAKES GREAT COFFEE dd OF COURSE WITH cARMEL CREAMER BUT FRESH POT IT IS HOT SUPPOSE TO STAY ON FOR 2 HOURS SECOND CUP LOOK WARM AND I CANNOT FOR THE LIFE OF ME FIGURE IT OUT ONLY KEEP COMPLAINING ABOUT IT. (WHICH OF COURSE DOESN'T MATER TO ANYONE ELSE BUT ME, AS I UNDERSTAND IT). BUT IT IS A REALLY GOOD PRODUCT, I JUST DO NOT FOR THE LIFE OF ME KNOW WHY THE HOT PLATE IS A JERK. THUS THE MICROWAVE.
customer_reviews.author: country

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the water filter that fits over the basket - ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee pot when my old one died . I'm not real impressed with it . The clock Not real impressed with this coffee pot . The light on the clock onthis machine does not come on at all . I do not like the water filter that fits over the basket - and have had trouble with the coffee pot running over .I would not buy this particular coffee pot again .
customer_reviews.author: Judie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months, only used bottled water in it and all of a sudden it just stopped brewing coffee. This was my third and final Mr Coffee coffee pot. Thought it was due to hard water but this one never got water from the faucet and it still died.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July. Stopped dripping water in November. No drama. No major event. Lights on. Still in tact. Just quit working. (For cleaning... there is a LIP when tipping the entire contraption upside down that catches liquid. This is mostly a non entity until your child puts coffee grounds in the wrong location. Which coincidentally happened to my OLD Mr coffee maker which I sent to college and repurchased. Old mr. Coffee still working. My replacement... dead.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it and SUPER affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I love my coffee pot! It's so simple to use and I bought it cheaper online than in the store! It works great and doesn't take forever to make coffee. I love that I have fresh coffee first thing in the morning being able to program it!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: first was awesome and lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one, first was awesome and lasted 4 years. I decided to stay with Mr. Coffee and this one lasted 5 months. lights on but beyond that, completely dead. There are a couple other options so it is time to move on.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Worst coffee maker ever. Alarm is annoying. Goes off when coffee starts, when its done and when pot shuts off.. after a few months of using purified water it took 20 minutes to make a full pot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unit has made at least one 12-cup pot of coffee per day since it was purchased 5/8/18
customer_reviews.text: No hint of plastic smell after the first 2 brews; coffee taste never impacted by plastic smell. The pot may dribble when dispensing water or coffee; some dexterity require by operator to manage lid. We just make coffee with it. No temperatures evaluated. Variation in pot-to-pot coffee strength not dwelled upon; we use roughly the same number of scoops of coffee and volume of water per pot. Haven't used the automatic-start feature but unit does appear to keep time well when compared to the clocks on the oven, microwave and numerous cell phones in our home. We just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Have been using Mr. Coffee for years!  Best tasting.
customer_reviews.text: Best results when using one heaping teaspoon per one cup as marked on decanter. 2 decanter cups fill one mug. Have to use about 10 times in order for machine to get properly broken in for best coffee flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Setauket Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. I no longer have to use my home delivered ($$) water to have great tasting coffee. The filter that came with it started breaking apart before it was time the be replaced. I also bought aftermarket replacement filters the are of much better quality, I reviewed them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mo-Licious

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this brand
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I have purchased two of these model. The first one lasted 1 year. I purchased the same model and after 1.5 months nothing works. The display is broken and now wont even turn on. I will never buy Mr Coffee brand again. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Becker

customer_reviews.title: Plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used this coffee make a few times after receiving it. I cleaned the whole thing before the first use. It seems to have this new plastic smell and taste to the coffee that tastes horrible! I’ve cleaned it a few more times, still can’t get rid of the bad taste it gives my coffee. I am trying a vinegar/water mixture though it today to see if that helps. If not, I might have to return it. I had the same exact mr. coffee coffee maker for 4 years before purchasing a replacement loved it. Not sure what’s going on with this one...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Selpien

customer_reviews.title: Disheartened
customer_reviews.text: We bought this coffeemaker on November 1, 2016. When turned on, it has a burnt wiring smell which was undetected at first because we had colds and weren't smelling well. We are now fearful of both the safety of this product in our home and the danger of drinking the coffee. We are disheartened as we have used Mr. Coffee drip coffee makers for 30 years. We saved no packaging or anything for returns as we had no intention of returning. Additionally, it was ordered for us by our daughter, and I will not trouble her with this issue for a $30 coffeemaker. We are, however, done with Mr. Coffee as well as online ordering of small appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Id like to ree state my review. It lasted a few months before the glass shattered but i can always get a replacement pot all in all the coffee maker works fine but its still silly the glass shattered from it being to hot thats the point of a coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: I've had mine 4 years no issues
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot, I have had the red version for 4 years and still works perfect, just bought this new one because I wanted a different color. I was thinking this one would be more brushed nickel color but it is a shiny silver, I can see myself in it almost like a mirror. But I will always buy this coffee pot it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: I recieved a used broken one.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee pot was probably good but what we received was an older model that was used and cracked. We didn't even use it I was so embarrassed giving this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Josh N

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: The first week it had a dummy smell. I would advise you to run several pots of plain water through when you first get it. Coffee is hot and tastes good. No complaints so far after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Great price and is working fine. We don't really use the bells and whistles and we unplug our coffee pots when not in use due to safety concerns over unattended heating elements (look it up) so the clock not lighting up at all is no biggie. But yes if you want a clock this does not light up at all. Easy to fill and the decanter pours really well with less dripping than out previous Mr. Coffee
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: Has some issues but it did work
customer_reviews.text: There is no background light for the clock. It wouldn't sit level because of a twist in the body and comparing to a costco model we had, the water outlet on top of the grounds is dispersed over a confind area where as the costco version had a water outlet that covered all the grounds. With small batches of making coffee, this was a problem as the coffee would be weak in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Grandeur I.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong carafe sent
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing my old coffe maker ( same style/brand) when received the replacement the carafe did not fit. About an inch too short so the water just filled in my basket. Long story short had to use my old carafe. What the hell
customer_reviews.author: Cancercrab

customer_reviews.title: Trash after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Trash after 3 months. Product arrived 9-30-19 by 12-30-19 digital clock had aquired moisture inside becoming unreadable making timer unusable 7 days later clock quit altogether. This is my second Mr. Coffee coffee maker to break within a year. Not buying anymore Mr. Coffee products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff parks

customer_reviews.title: Just give it a bit
customer_reviews.text: At first it had a real bad plastic smell I thought I would have to get rid of it. But it did go away after a little bit and now it works great especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ColbyM

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: No way to adjust the carafe temperature like my previous Mister Coffee. Also the 2-hour automatic shut-off is too short of a time and not able to adjust it. Returned the unit for Cuisinart that I can adjust the carafe temperature and the cutoff is variable up to 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Greene

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee machine. I had the same one that burned itself out. There is one thing I don't like is when it shuts off the strength doesn't stay on strong so the next pot you have to remember to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: 10 months and it’s already leaking water out the bottom. Now we’ll see if I can get it warrantied.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Lasted 31 days
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a month, then spews steam and water all over, controls and clock appear to be water damaged, will not cut off when brew finished.. Worse than the product is customer service. Waited over 30 minutes on old to talk to someone, finally gave up on them and the Mr Coffee products and company.
customer_reviews.author: L Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long :(
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker worked fairly well. The delay brew was nice for having coffee ready in the morning. The flavor of the coffee was decent, but my french press with the same coffee and different grind tasted far better. A little over two months after buying the coffee maker the water tank began to leak out of the base making unuseable with out spilling water everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna G

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ kinda big
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is good, tea too. Loading water is tricky, i keep spilling the water. Im short usually tippy toeing with eyes still 1l2 closed. With no visible fill guage. Lots of unused buttons coffee doesnt take long with a nice little beep to tell me when done. Nice awwww very good. ⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: julie a waymack gobofspit

customer_reviews.title: Moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Coffee has always been a great product to buy. Better than black and decker. They last a long time, I have had mine for 3yrs and it's still running, and it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea gibson

customer_reviews.title: Leaks badly
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker leaks like crazy. Everytime we make coffee we are cleaning up a mess Mr coffee refuses to put the coffee in the pot... It appears that the counter and floor are the best option REALLY DONT WAUSTE
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Jaudon-Belvin

customer_reviews.title: Update - quit working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Have used this model of coffee pot for several years. Don't use the water filter disk and it tastes fine. Update: quit working after 6 months of use. Not like the previous Mr. Coffee's I've had. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 20 months and then died...just stopped brewing. Glad I bought the insurance for $3.99 to get a refund. I will spend a little more money and buy a better coffee maker this time around...I guess for the price it was good, but I would still have liked for it to last longer...I dislike that it was made to be so disposable so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE

It features plenty of programmable options, like Delay Brew for coffee when you want it, or Brew Strength Selector to produce a bolder, richer taste. As coffee brews and that heavenly aroma fills the air, you can grab a cup before the cycle finishes with Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause. And since coffee is all about taste, you'll be glad to know that the Water Filtration system removes chlorine and impurities from the water during the brew cycle.
